request."},"getWithdrawCrossChainRequestHash((address,uint256,string,bool,uint256))":{"return":"Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the crosschain withdraw request."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.\r"}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"Pause()":{"notice":"Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL.\r Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.\r      * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause\r"},"Resume()":{"notice":"Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow.\r Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.\r"},"forceWithdraw(address)":{"notice":"Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token.\r The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.\r      * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.\r"},"requestForceWithdraw()":{"notice":"Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token.\r The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.\r      * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled.\r"},"transferFor((address,uint256[],address[],uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts.\r Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission.\r Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.\r      * Requirements:\r - `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address.\r - `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length.\r"},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient.\r Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission.\r Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.\r      * Requirements:\r - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address.\r - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`.\r"},"withdraw((address,uint256,address,bool,uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset.\r Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.\r The function will atomically perform the following operations:\r      *      1. Validate the user signature\r     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`\r     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`\r      * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.\r The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.\r      * Requirements:\r - The request hash has to be unique.\r - The `request.isCrosschain` is False.\r"},"withdrawCrossChain((address,uint256,string,bool,uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset.\r Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.\r The function will atomically perform the following operations:\r      *      1. Validate the user signature\r     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`\r     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address\r      * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending\r on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations\r      * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn.\r The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.\r      * Requirements:\r - The request hash has to be unique.\r - The `request.isCrosschain` is True.\r"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/mnt/c/conflux/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/CRCL.sol":"CRCL"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/mnt/c/conflux/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC1820/ERC1820ImplementerInterface.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdf604dfcec52a27f035bfb505dd15d6556f5a66324b79ba8ad8c4e3bd78dc1f2","urls":["bzz-raw://c9d22bb91735a1c24669cd39aa391d0fbfccbaf473330e5da4677eba83827159","dweb:/ipfs/QmXsPsJJAAs54T2bEt5qXT41V5smSeytZn7sNExkw9mMUe"]},"/mnt/c/conflux/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/ERC777.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ce6f615692fd5f6728b8329d6d422660bfd252bf90c0dbf02f7dd11f703aeba","urls":["bzz-raw://108f17b450413334f449aa6f3023ee31c6b906f096314d55110cb68706eb3487","dweb:/ipfs/QmZ32TF7s8Fp3v58WSfGMvGcCmiQLjzrUfeuzo2bKLaj2W"]},"/mnt/c/conflux/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/ERC777TokenBase.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7ec5f16fef66c4d282bc177ce9d5049ea8ff6a5767855fab9b9ea2c71c4fbeac","urls":["bzz-raw://1d7965eb140537ef5fe198b5b036243041c0cc56cf49245a7823155690199dc4","dweb:/ipfs/QmZxJG42m9PFaHcW45JXqU5mo9inD2iUCrZTP4hx38gt5y"]},"/mnt/c/conflux/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/libs/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0x39ce83317fa8f5779c68f24fc6b41ac9f57ed5f97c005283e1f439b8479622d1","urls":["bzz-raw://e7d58baa389e65893560b022698e3138365b6484c991a59a3752788f3886795d","dweb:/ipfs/QmYtkkfc4UNSMsiwMCgzwVzECXBgrn6ApEUAPkvNqHwKHc"]},"/mnt/c/conflux/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/libs/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdff83c36c8ff780a4eb46b9f538b596ff3faaaa08678a471edc5161682cc77cb","urls":["bzz-raw://962ec77ab8660ae65708869490e575b1cd5b4c61a1a893ca79cdfb1c55a3b812","dweb:/ipfs/QmQqoTRCPJyH6w6yfQLKzbAHUrLJaCxGGpSRfC944hp7Cm"]},"/mnt/c/conflux/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/libs/IERC777.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd6c7c70b45e89f641863c7ffbb15a064672c1fb4c005c5b049014a0ba598c400","urls":["bzz-raw://0eeaaa7a2be6a894bbddfd7af18fc35b9c06331994402bcb22dcfd3224943ae6","dweb:/ipfs/QmSNgwdUcdxmaLLbABFuYnrJPsw nodes.documentation:
Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient.
Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission.
Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.

     * Requirements:
- `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address.
- `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`.
nodes.name: transferFrom

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: the request has already been executed"

arguments.value: CRCL: the request has already been executed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: the request has already been executed"

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts.
Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission.
Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.

     * Requirements:
- `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address.
- `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length.
nodes.name: transferFor

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: the request has already been executed"

arguments.value: CRCL: the request has already been executed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: the request has already been executed"

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
The function will atomically perform the following operations:

     *      1. Validate the user signature
     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`
     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`

     * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.
The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.

     * Requirements:
- The request hash has to be unique.
- The `request.isCrosschain` is False.
nodes.name: withdraw

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: the request has already been executed"

arguments.value: CRCL: the request has already been executed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: the request has already been executed"

arguments.value: CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
The function will atomically perform the following operations:

     *      1. Validate the user signature
     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`
     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address

     * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending
on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations

     * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn.
The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.

     * Requirements:
- The request hash has to be unique.
- The `request.isCrosschain` is True.
nodes.name: withdrawCrossChain

nodes.documentation:
Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token.
The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.

     * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled.
nodes.name: requestForceWithdraw

nodes.documentation:
Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token.
The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.

     * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.
nodes.name: forceWithdraw

nodes.documentation:
Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.

     * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause
nodes.name: Pause

nodes.documentation:
Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
nodes.name: Resume

The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
The function will atomically perform the following operations:

     *      1. Validate the user signature
     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`
     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address

     * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending
on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations

     * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn.
The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.

     * Requirements:
- The request hash has to be unique.
- The `request.isCrosschain` is True.

getRequestHash((address,uint256,address,.return: Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the withdraw request.

getTransferRequestHash((address,uint256[.return: Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the transfer request.

getWithdrawCrossChainRequestHash((addres.return: Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the crosschain withdraw request.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

Pause().notice: Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.      * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause

Resume().notice: Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.

forceWithdraw(address).notice: Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.      * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.

requestForceWithdraw().notice: Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.      * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled.

transferFor((address,uint256[],address[].notice: Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts. Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.      * Requirements: - `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address. - `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient. Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.      * Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`.

withdraw((address,uint256,address,bool,u.notice: Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:      *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`      * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred. The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.      * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is False.

withdrawCrossChain((address,uint256,stri.notice: Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:      *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address      * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations      * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn. The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.      * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is True.
